easySentences: The sun set over the ocean, painting the sky in a beautiful array of colors. The sun rose slowly over the horizon, casting a warm glow on the sleepy town below. The sun sets over the horizon, painting the sky in shades of pink and orange.
After the storm passed, the sun came out and painted the sky in vibrant shades of orange and pink. The cat chased the squirrel up the tall oak tree. The cat chased the squirrel up the tree.
